remarks: The supremum is preserved by extended addition set operation.  (provided minus infinity is not involved as it does not behave well with addition) (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 20-Mar-2017.)
statement:
xrofsup.1 $e |- ( ph -> X C_ RR* ) $.
xrofsup.2 $e |- ( ph -> Y C_ RR* ) $.
xrofsup.3 $e |- ( ph -> sup ( X , RR* , < ) =/= -oo ) $.
xrofsup.4 $e |- ( ph -> sup ( Y , RR* , < ) =/= -oo ) $.
xrofsup.5 $e |- ( ph -> Z = ( +e " ( X X. Y ) ) ) $.
xrofsup $p |- ( ph -> sup ( Z , RR* , < ) = ( sup ( X , RR* , < ) +e sup ( Y , RR* , < ) ) ) $.
